QUESTION: But ye shall receive power after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you: and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem, and in all Judaea, and in Samaria, and unto the uttermost part of the earth.
Repent ye therefore, and be converted, that your sins may be blotted out, when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord;
Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is no other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.
Then Peter opened his mouth, and said, Of a truth I perceive that God is no respecter of persons:
How God anointed Jesus of Nazereth with the Holy Ghost and with power: who went about doing good, and healing all that were oppressed of the devil; for God was with him.
For in him we live, and move and have our being; as certain also of your own poets have said, For we are also his offspring.
